I love horror games. Dead by Daylight has a really scary game play, feels like you're really in a slasher film. Love the graphics and the soundtracks. The new soundtrack from All Kill is really cool. I mainly play as a Survivor. I also play as a Killer but I still suck at it.

Sometimes though, it can be quite buggy. But well. I recommend it!

Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught, tortured and killed.

Survivors play in third-person and have the advantage of better situational awareness. The Killer plays in first-person and is more focused on their prey.

The Survivors' goal in each encounter is to escape the Killing Ground without getting caught by the Killer - something that sounds easier than it is, especially when the environment changes every time you play.
I enjoy this game very much. Load up, play a few games. Get face camped. Rage quit and do it all over again the following day. 5 stars

I know others like this game, but it is not friendly at all to new players, is grindy and a bit repetitive, and the genre is not my favorite. So this is a personal review, but it's still alright to play with friends if you already own it. I still recommend against the game for a general audience.
very good game it needs to make a comeback

When i started playing this game it had 8 killers and 9 survivors.. doctor and feng min where new characters... back then the blood point system made sense..but now around 15-16 dlcs later and 30 more characters the grind is just too much for new players and the blood point system is still the same even tho characters have increased by 200 % .. if you are playing killer all the time with bbq chilli its probably ok..but anyone trying to play survivor is just too starved and malnourished for blood points.If you try this game out at start sure you will be matched with other players who just brought the game but when you start going from rank 20 to around 15.. you will see that most people have the op perks that you wont be having for atleast a good 100-200 hours..also the amount of dlcs one that sees before buying the game can be too many..also the community has only become more toxic..any new player trying to buy this game will probably hesitate by seeing the grind,amount of paid dlcs to buy and the tryhard toxic community that alot other reviews talk about..its become a niche game of people who have been playing since the start who have been grinding since the start having all p3 50 characters with all perks or atleast decent amount of perks of all the characters instead of trying to increase a steady playerbase.

Even if you like grinding and ignore that part then theres even more issues

Bvhr are cutting their own tree they grew for 5 years... people liked this game as it was before the sbmm match making .. the resident evil chapter brought in alot of new players and this game had alot of positivity around it and had around 100k players playing it just on pc concurrently.. now its dropped to 30.. and this ring chapter will bring people back for like a week . SBMM makes everyone tryhard to death to reach rank 1 to get the 1 million blood point every month..because it wasnt like this people played casual and tried various builds alot like if you where rank 4 you would go down to rank 8 after a month without too much rank changing compared to everyone going back to rank 20 now.

and beforehand it actually kinda showed the type of games you would get back then.. rank 1-4? nurse and hillbilly.. rank 5-8? hag myers spirit rank 9-12?clown freddy pig legion rank 13-15? trapper wraith or various other m1 killers and survivors didnt always stick to the same 6 perks like they do now..like heal boon totem which has literally made it too survivor sided and the few options to counter is if you go full expose build or decide to tunnel em out or just go PLAGUE MOMMY and the obvious SWF (DS,DH,BT,PROVE THYSELF,UNBREAKABLE) squad with mics.Most people are just less reluctant to play more of DBD if the main purpose is just to grind hard. People played it before september 2021 because they genuinely enjoyed it.. altho you can watch otzdarva or coconut discussing those stuff eitherway.

basically 70 % of the dbd playerbase is casual and only the 30 % competitive ones are gonna stick around if they keep heading this direction.. for starters maybe add an offline bot mode? or a casual non ranked mode? or maybe just the whole blood point reward for your rank at the end of the month thing be shifted to 2 months or 3 months ?so the competitive ones can just get to rank 1 in 20 days within the 3 month period and then the ranks are stable for atleast the next 2.5 months and everyone gets the fruit they deserve for it. or just how about a fun 2killer vs 8 survivor mode that doesnt grant any bps just for fun?? food for thought

Broken SBMM where new players who just start the game can match against people with 2,000-5,000 hours 
Too Much to grind now, broken matchmaking,toxic killers and survivors that abuse that SBMM and circle of healing boon totem.

Almost impossible for any new player to come try the game and have an amazing experience.
